channel.title: Opinion on StarpTech
channel.description: Recent content in Opinion on StarpTech

item.title: The classic developer nowadays ...
item.description: You use Javascript with a powerful framework like Angular or React to implement a great user experience. Perhaps you want to get the most of the line and use babel. You love automatism and create your own build pipeline with gulp or grunt. You are hungry for a REST API to play with data in your application. Your API is build with proven software like NodeJs, .NET Core or Spring.
